keys: restes sains de ver à soie
remains sano del baco da seta
restos sano del gusano de seda

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_79521</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pasteur's silkworm experiments</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Seidenraupeexperimente Pasteurs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Expériences du ver à soie de Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Experiências do bicho-da-seda de Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esperimenti del baco da seta del Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πειράματα μεταξοσκωλήκων Pasteur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Experimentos del gusano de seda de Pasteur</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of three illustrations showing Pasteur's silkworm experiments. In this illustration, silkworms stay healthy after ingesting leaves smeared with the remains of healthy silkworms.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eating</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">healthy silkworm remains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ingesting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Louis Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von drei Abbildungen 
experimentiert das Zeigen von von Seidenraupe Pasteurs. In 
dieser Abbildung Seidenraupeaufenthalt gesund, nachdem die Blätter 
eingenommen worden sind, die mit dem Remains der gesunden Seidenraupen
geschmiert werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de trois illustrations montrer le 
ver à soie de Pasteur expérimente. Dans cette illustration, 
séjour de vers à soie sain après l'ingestion des feuilles enduites 
des restes des vers à soie sains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de três ilustrações mostrar o 
bicho-da-seda de Pasteur experimenta. Nesta ilustração, estada
dos bichos-da-seda saudável após ingesting as folhas manchadas com o
remains de bichos-da-seda saudáveis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di tre illustrazioni mostrare il
baco da seta del Pasteur sperimenta. In questa illustrazione, 
soggiorno dei bachi da seta sano dopo l'ingestione dei fogli spalmati 
di remains dei bachi da seta sani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τριών απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν πειράματα 
μεταξοσκωλήκων Pasteur. Σε αυτήν την απεικόνιση, παραμονή
μεταξοσκωλήκων υγιής μετά από να λάβει τα φύλλα που λερώνονται 
με τα υπολείμματα των υγιών μεταξοσκωλήκων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de tres ilustraciones mostrar el 
gusano de seda de Pasteur experimenta. En esta ilustración, 
estancia de los gusanos de seda sana después de injerir las hojas 
manchadas con el restos de gusanos de seda sanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Essen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">gesunden Seidenraupe Remains</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einnehmen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Louis Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">manger</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">restes sains de ver à soie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">ingestion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Louis Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">comer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">remains saudável do bicho-da-seda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">ingesting</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Louis Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">consumo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">remains sano del baco da seta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ingestione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Louis Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανάλωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ο υγιής μεταξοσκώληκας παραμένει</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">να λάβει</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Λοuης Pasteur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
